entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Papineau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:33 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 3.4°C

Observed at: Gatineau Airport 5:00 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 3.4°C

Visibility: 24.1 km

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow or freezing rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening then changing to periods of freezing rain overnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm over northern sections. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
